article_title: As Rock Hill forum approaches, a look at Clinton, O’Malley and Sanders on the issues
article_text:
The 3 Democratic presidential candidates agree on most issues

But there are some nuances to the positions each has taken

Here’s a quick look at where they stand, and some personal info

article_metadata.title: As Rock Hill forum approaches, a look at Clinton, O’Malley and Sanders on the issues | The Herald

og.description: The three Democratic presidential candidates who will appear at Friday’s First in the South Democratic Presidential Forum at Winthrop University – Hillary Clinton, Bernie Sanders and Martin O’Malley – overlap significantly in their positions on key issues, each pushing a liberal agenda by different degrees:
og.title: As Rock Hill forum approaches, a look at Clinton, O’Malley and Sanders on the issues
